name: Hellboard Hitcher
description:
Destroy the cubes and walls within the level while avoiding falling off and the fire.

The basic controls are as default in Unreal engine's advanced vehicle project

W A S D to move

Spacebar to handbrake

Then the controls I added are

R to reset level

K to shoot.

The initial idea of this game was a table top driving game which is summoned from hell. Your soul is converted to a vehicle which you play as to cause mayhem.  This is just a prototype I did for a 1 week jam with Side Quest. 

Also this is my first game! I didn't know how I'd make it before this week. Though I started learning the art side of Unreal Engine around 8 weeks ago.
